head.title: Villas with pools | Interhome
head.description: Find a holiday villa with pool for your next vacation with interhome; relax by the pool, take a swim, invite your friends and take your vacation in style.

links.label: Safe, enjoyable vacations - discover our vacation ideas

content.textLeft:
Booking villas with pools can take all the stress out of your family break by providing the kids with a ready-made source of entertainment. When it comes to destinations, you can choose from Luxury Villas in countries: such as France, Italy, Portugal, Spain and Croatia. If you are looking for the perfect family villas, then you may want to look into the villas with private pools that are available, giving the kids plenty of space to enjoy the weather without disturbing anyone else.

Villas with pools sounds like something quite luxurious, and probably expensive, however, we have a full range of villas that cater to all budgets, including value-for-money villas, meaning that you can enjoy the luxury of your own space, and your own pool, your own convenience and your own schedule at some truly unbelievable prices.
content.textRight: Most of our villas with pools also have their own enclosed grounds or gardens, so you really can soak up the sun, relax by the pool, and enjoy your family just as though you were at home, only with more sunshine!
